trans-unit.source: A difference of less than 0.5 stars between treatments may not be statistically significant or meaningful. Differences of greater than 0.5 stars between two treatments displayed are always statistically significant. The weighted average rating is a Bayesian estimate of the true average rating, given the observed ratings so far. The formula combines the global mean rating (3.3 stars) with the observations as follows:
trans-unit.target: 不同治疗方法之间小于0.5星差距可能在统计学意义上不显著。两种治疗方法有大于0.5星的差异是一直在统计学意义上显著的。已有的评分的加权平均是真实平均评分的贝叶斯估计。方程根据以下的方式将全球平均评分（3.3星）和观测结合在一起：

trans-unit.source: (r = estimate of average rating, q = number of ratings, μ = average of the observed ratings):
trans-unit.target: （r=估计平均评分，q=评分的数量，μ=观测到的平均评分）：

trans-unit.target: 这个隐私权声明描述了我们将如何保护并处理您通过网络，手机和相关设备提供给我们的个人信息。

trans-unit.source: The information we request at registration. That we do not use or share your Personally Identifiable Information, other than as described in our Privacy Statement
trans-unit.target: 我们不使用或分享您的个人身份信息，除了我们在隐私权声明所描述的情况。

trans-unit.source: When we say we care about your privacy, we mean it. Privacy policies are important documents, but many people don't read them because they are long, confusing, and written in "legalese."
trans-unit.target: 隐私政策是重要的文件，但是许多人不阅读他们引文他们长，令人迷惑并且用法律术语撰写。

trans-unit.source: We've designed our Privacy Statement with you in mind, creating links to the most common questions about HealthTap and HealthTap Premium Services (including Prime and Concierge) and how these services work where privacy issues may be involved. Everything in written in plain, easy to understand language.
trans-unit.target: 我们与您在心中编撰了隐私权声明，创建关于HealthTap和HealthTap Premium Services（包括基础费用和管理费用）的最常见的问题和当会牵涉隐私事项时这些服务是如何来运作的链接。

trans-unit.source: that describes our core beliefs about privacy and your core rights as a user of our services. These documents are located on our
trans-unit.target: 描述了对隐私的核心观念和您作为我们服务使用者的核心权利。

trans-unit.source: By continuing to use HealthTap, you agree to this Privacy Statement and any updates to it. This means that if the Privacy Statement changes, you agree to these changes if you keep using HealthTap. When this policy is changed (other than for typographical corrections or minor changes that do not alter its meaning), we will update the "last modified" date at the top of the policy. We may provide a summary at the bottom of the policy, describing the types of changes made.
trans-unit.target: 您持续使用HealthTap代表您同意隐私声明和它的任何更新。这意味着如果隐私声明改变了，您保持使用HealthTap的行为代表您同意这些改变。当政策改变了（除了印刷错误或者不改变意思的不重要改变），我们会会在政策的最顶部更新“最近一次修改”的日期。我们会在政策的底部提供一个总结，描述做出改变的类型。

trans-unit.source: Your use of HealthTap is anonymous. Your Personally Identifiable Information (your real name, date of birth, email address and other such information) is not visible to others. Staying anonymous on HealthTap is easy - simply don't post personally identifiable information (such as your name) in your questions or other content visible to others.
trans-unit.target: 您的个人身份信息（真实姓名，出生日期，邮箱地址和其他同类信息）不对其他人可见。在HealthTap上保持匿名是容易的-只要不要在您的问题或其他可以被其他人看到的内容中，发布个人身份信息。

trans-unit.source: Like an in-person patient-doctor interaction, HealthTap Prime and HealthTap Concierge are confidential but not anonymous services. When using Premium Services, some Profile information (including your real name and health information from your Profile) is visible to doctors with whom you enter into consults. Your personal contact information is never visible on HealthTap to other members or doctors.
trans-unit.target: 就像直接的的医生与病人之间的交流，HealthTap Prime和HealthTap Concierge是秘密的但不匿名的服务。当使用高级服务时，有一些描述信息（包括真名和您资料中的健康信息）可以被您所咨询的医生看到。您的个人联系信息是永远无法被HealthTap的其他成员和医生看到的。

trans-unit.source: Yes. HealthTap and HealthTap Premium Services use bank-level security and encryption. We meet HIPAA security standards for all interactions subject to HIPAA security regulations. We use a variety of technologies and procedures to help protect the security of your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.
trans-unit.target: 是。我们符合HIPAA安全标准，因为所有的交易都是受制于HIPAA安全规则的。我们使用了广泛的技术和流程来保护您的个人信息免受未授权的登录，使用和披露。

trans-unit.source: Your Profile contains the information you provide when you create a HealthTap account, including your name, email address and date of birth. You can add optional health information to your Profile, like personal data, health goals, medications, conditions, and other information, which helps to personalize your HealthTap experience. You choose what health information to add to your Profile through using HealthTap and adding information to your Profile.
trans-unit.target: 您的个人简述包含当您创建HealthTap账户时提供的信息，包括您的名字，邮箱和出生日期。您可以选择性的添加健康信息到您的个人简述中，比如您的个人数据，健康目标，药物治疗，症状和其他信息，这些信息可以帮助您个人化您的HealthTap体验。您在使用HealthTap并添加信息到您的个人简述时，可以选择在您的个人简述中添加什么健康信息。

trans-unit.source: Yes, you can add, edit or delete optional information appearing in your Profile at any time. You can edit, but not remove, certain information (like an email address) required for login and to use HealthTap, and doctor consult notes. You have a "right to amend" your health records and can add information to your consult notes or health record to make it more accurate or complete, or have a disagreement with noted in your health record, or update other profile information by submitting a request to HealthTap support (by phone, secure online form submission or email).
trans-unit.target: 是的，您可以在任何时候添加，编辑或删除出现在您资料中的选择性添加的信息。您可以编辑，但是不能移除注册，使用HealthTap和医生咨询记录需要提供的信息（如电子邮箱地址）。您“有权利修改”您的健康记录并且可以在您的咨询记录或者健康记录上添加信息来使您的信息更加精确或完整。您可以对您的健康记录中的记录提出异议，也可以通过提交获得HealthTap支持的申请来上传其他的个人资料信息（通过手机或者邮箱提交安全的在线表格）。

trans-unit.source: On HealthTap other members and doctors cannot see your Profile or the health information in it. We use information collected through your use of HealthTap to provide you with information about our current or future services, to enable the services we provide, and otherwise as described in this Privacy Statement. This Privacy Statement describes the ways that we use or disclose your information. In support of these uses, we may use personal information to:
trans-unit.target: 我们使用在您使用HealthTap过程中我们收集到的信息，为您提供我们现在或将来提供的服务的信息，也让我们提供的服务得以实现，除此以外您的信息将会根据隐私权声明中叙述的条款处理。这份隐私声明描述了我们使用和公开您的信息的方式。

trans-unit.source: Aggregated information is information from multiple members that is not associated with any individual user account; statistics are summaries of information, not associated with any individual user account; de-identified data does not include Personally Identifiable Information. Aggregated information and de-identified data and statistics are used to run and improve the services provided on or through HealthTap. This information may also be used by us or provided to our partners for purposes of research and analysis.
trans-unit.target: 整合信息和去除标识的数据和统计信息用于运行和提高HealthTap提供的服务。

trans-unit.source: Like most online services, HealthTap uses cookies. All browser cookies we use are encrypted. We use session ID cookies and persistent cookies to enable you to sign in and to help personalize HealthTap for you. Using cookies simplifies the delivery of relevant content and allows you to retrieve information you previously provided making use of HealthTap features easier. We link the information we store in session cookies to personally identifiable information you submit while on HealthTap. You have the ability to accept or decline cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser setting to decline some or all cookies if you prefer. If you choose to decline all cookies, you may not be able to use interactive features of HealthTap or other websites that depend on cookies.
trans-unit.target: 许多网页浏览器自动接受cookies，但是您通常可以在您的浏览器设定中修改来按您的意愿拒绝一些或所有cookies。

trans-unit.source: We value your privacy. This Privacy Statement describes how we will protect and handle the personal information that you provide to us through our web, mobile and related services. Among other things, the HealthTap Privacy Statement explains:
trans-unit.target: 这个隐私权声明描述了我们将如何保护并处理您通过网络，手机和相关设备提供给我们的个人信息。

trans-unit.source: When you sign up for HealthTap, you verify that you’ve read and agree to our Privacy Statement. Since you are agreeing to what’s contained in this document when using HealthTap, you’re encouraged to read it (if you haven't already).

trans-unit.source: When we say we care about your privacy, we mean it. Privacy policies are important documents, but many people don't read them because they are too long, are confusing, or are written in 'legalese.'

trans-unit.source: Because of this, we’ve designed our Privacy Statement with our members in mind, creating links to the most common questions members may have about the site and how it works where privacy issues may be involved. We’ve also written everything in plain, understandable language.
trans-unit.target: 因此，考虑到我们的成员，我们设计了隐私声明。在关于网站的最常见的问题上，以及在工作中可能涉及到的隐私问题上，我们都创建了链接。

trans-unit.source: We use personal information collected through HealthTap, including health and wellness information, to enable the services we provide, and as described in this Privacy Statement. This Privacy Statement describes the ways that we use or disclose your information. In support of these uses, we may use personal information to:
trans-unit.target: 我们如在隐私声明中所述那样使用通过HealthTap收集的个人信息来使服务可行，包括健康信息。这份隐私声明描述了我们使用和公开您的信息的方式。

trans-unit.source: Yes. You can edit or delete information in your Health Activity by signing in to your HealthTap account and editing your Health Activity. Once you edit or delete a record, you cannot retrieve it. Information in Private Conversations cannot be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 是。您能通过登录您的HealthTap账户并编辑健康活动来对其信息进行编辑或删除。

trans-unit.source: The security of your personal information is a top priority for us. We are committed to protecting the security of your personal information. Experts design our security measures and we use a variety of technologies and procedures to help protect the security of your personal information from unauthorized access, use and disclosure. For example, information transferred to HealthTap is encrypted. We restrict access to personal information to HealthTap employees, contractors, and agents who need to know that information in order to operate, develop, or improve our services. These individuals are bound by confidentiality obligations and may be subject to discipline, including termination and criminal prosecution, if they fail to meet these obligations. No method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure, however. Therefore, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. More information about our security measures is located on our
trans-unit.target: 我们的安全措施由专家设计并使用一系列科技和程序来保护您的个人信息不受未经授权的获得、使用或公开。我们严格限制需要了解个人信息以运营、开发或改进我们的服务的HealthTap的员工、承包商和代理商获取这些信息。这些个人受保密义务的约束，如果他们没有尽到这些义务将会受到包括终止业务和犯罪起诉在内的法律的制约。然而没有一种网络传输或电子储存的方法是100%安全的。

trans-unit.source: We use cookies to enable you to sign in and to help personalize HealthTap. Using cookies simplifies the process of delivering relevant content and allows you to retrieve the information you previously provided, so that you can easily use the site's features. We use both session ID cookies and persistent cookies, and all browser Cookies we use are encrypted. We link the information we store in session cookies to personally identifiable information you submit while on our site. You have the ability to accept or decline cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser setting to decline some or all cookies if you prefer. If you choose to decline all cookies, you may not be able to use interactive features of this or other web sites that depend on cookies.
trans-unit.target: 使用cookies简化了提供内容的过程，并允许您检索您以前提供的信息，以便您可以轻松地使用该网站的功能。我们同时使用会话识别cookies和持续性cookies，我们使用的所有浏览器cookies都是加密的。我们在网站上将您提交的个人可识别信息与我们储存在会话cookies中的信息连接起来。许多网页浏览器自动接受cookies，但是您通常可以在您的浏览器设定中修改来按您的意愿拒绝一些或所有cookies。如果您选择拒绝所有cookies，您可能不能使用基于cookies的这个或其他网站的互动特征。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap does not share your Personally Identifiable Information (for example, your real name or email address) with anyone unless you permit it. When you enter into a private health conversation with a doctor on HealthTap for a fee, you permit your Personally Identifiable Information to be made available to this doctor. HealthTap works by helping you find reliable and personalized health information. As part of this service, HealthTap may provide you with information about external service providers (“Service Providers”) that may be of interest or use to you (for example, a health clinic). HealthTap does not provide these external Service Providers with any Personally Identifiable Information about you, without your express consent. Service Providers cannot access your Health Activity or other health and wellness information through HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap除非在您允许的情况下，否则不会和他人分享您的个人可识别信息（比如您的真实姓名或邮箱地址）。当您付费与HealthTap上一名医生开始私人健康对话时视为您允许使您的个人身份可识别信息对其可见。HealthTap的运营理念是帮助您找到可靠的私人健康信息。作为服务的一部分，HealthTap会给您提供您可能感兴趣或对您有益的外部服务商（比如健康诊所）。HealthTap在没有您明确的同意下不会向这些外部服务商提供任何关于您的个人身份可识别信息。服务提供商不能通过HealthTap获得您健康活动或其他的健康信息。

trans-unit.source: Some members may want to share personal information with a Service Provider. You can always do this on your own. trans-unit.source: Term. The initial term of this Agreement shall be for one (1) year from the Effective Date (“Initial Term”), and shall automatically renew for additional one (1) year terms (each a “Renewal Term”) unless Licensee provides Licensor with written notice of its intent not to renew at least ninety (90) days prior to any such Renewal Term. HealthTap may terminate this agreement for convenience upon thirty (30) notice to Licensee but in the event of such termination Licesee shall retain the right to sell any Pre-Paid subscriptions under the terms of this Agreement for the applicable Calendar Year.

trans-unit.source: Effect of Termination. In the event of termination of this Agreement, the rights and licenses granted to Licensee hereunder shall immediately terminate and Licensee shall cease to market, distribute or sell the HealthTap Software; in the event of termination of this Agreement by Licensee prior to the end of any term, described above, any fees due to HealthTap hereunder for the term including but not limited to any Annual Revenue Minimum shall become immediately due and payable. Fees due to Licensee shall be paid within sixty (60) days after termination, following a final accounting of any Licensee Commission due as of the date of Termination. The provisions of this Agreement governing Ownership, Confidentiality, Limitation of Liability, the Relationship of the Parties, and Miscellaneous Provisions shall survive termination or cancelation of this Agreement for any reason.

. During the Term the Practice shall be liable to HealthTap for License Fees. These fees may include an annual base fee (if any) and/or transactional license fees (i.e. a per- consult fee). The License Fees are set forth or referenced in Schedule B (“License Fees”) for the Licensed Services. The annual base (if any) License Fee shall be paid in advance by the Practice and when due. In payment of the transactional License Fee, the Practice hereby authorizes HealthTap to: (i) collect and deposit, on behalf of the Practice, in a bank account in the name of HealthTap, the consultation fee for the Remote Medical Consultation conducted by the Practice; and (ii) deduct and retain the License Fee from the consultation fee collected by HealthTap prior to payment in full of the annual base (if any) license fee and then remitting to the Practice the remaining portion of the consultation fee for the Remote Medical Consultation. Remittances to the Practice shall be made on a regular basis, on or about the first of every month or otherwise as set forth in Schedule B. License Fees are subject to change at any time.

. In the event the Licensee Fee is not collected by HealthTap or otherwise is insufficient or remains unpaid in full forty-five (45) or more days from the date such fee is due and owing from the Practice to HealthTap, HealthTap may, in its discretion, terminate this Agreement.

. The Practice shall be responsible for and shall pay or reimburse HealthTap for any sales, use, import, excise, value added or other taxes or levies associated with this Agreement and the Licensed Services, excluding any taxes based on the net income of HealthTap, unless customer is tax exempt and provides documentation of such.

. HealthTap may, from time to time, in its sole discretion provide Updates to the Practice, such updates may be provided across the platform in the cloud. For purposes of this Agreement, “Updates” means corrections, changes and improvements to the Licensed Services that (i) relate to the operating performance of the Licensed Services, but do not change the basic function of the Licensed Services; (ii) are intended for general commercial use in connection with the Licensed Services; and (iii) are provided generally to HealthTap’s other customers without additional charge. Updates do not necessarily include new releases or versions of the Licensed Services for which HealthTap, in its sole and exclusive discretion, imposes an additional charge. HealthTap may, however, in its sole and exclusive discretion, provide Updates to the Practice that include new functionality. Any and all Updates are deemed part of the Licensed Services and shall be protected and governed by the terms and conditions of this Agreement and subject to the license granted in Section 1.

. The Practice acknowledges and agrees that the Licensed Services constitute valuable and confidential proprietary information and intellectual property of HealthTap, that are protected under civil and criminal law and under the laws of patent, copyright and trade secret, and, except as expressly provided herein, shall not be disclosed in any form by the Practice to any unauthorized third party. Each Party agrees that all information supplied by one Party and its affiliates and agents (collectively, the “Disclosing Party”) to the other (“Receiving Party”) including, without limitation, (i) source code, trade secrets, databases, designs and techniques, engine protocols, models, displays and manuals, and the selection, coordination, and arrangement of the contents of such materials; and (ii) any unpublished information concerning research activities and plans, customers, marketing or sales plans, sales forecasts or results of marketing efforts, pricing or pricing strategies, costs, operational techniques, strategic plans, and unpublished financial information, including information concerning revenues, profits and profit margins will be deemed confidential and proprietary to the Disclosing Party, regardless of whether such information was disclosed intentionally or unintentionally or marked as “confidential” or “proprietary” (“Confidential Information”). The Licensed Services shall be deemed Confidential Information of HealthTap.

. Confidential Information will not include any information or material, or any element thereof, whether or not such information or material is Confidential Information for the purposes of this Agreement, to the extent any such information or material, or any element thereof: (a) has previously become or is generally known, unless it has become generally known through a breach of this Agreement or a similar confidentiality or non- disclosure agreement, obligation or duty; (b) was already rightfully known to the Receiving Party prior to being disclosed by or obtained from the Disclosing Party as evidenced by written records kept in the ordinary course of business or by proof of actual use by the Receiving Party; (c) has been or is hereafter rightfully received by the Receiving Party from a third person (other than the Disclosing Party) without restriction or disclosure and without breach of a duty of confidentiality to the Disclosing Party; or (d) has been independently developed by the Receiving Party without access to Confidential Information of the Disclosing Party. It will be presumed that any Confidential Information in a Receiving Party’s possession is not within exceptions (b), (c) or (d) above, and the burden will be upon the Receiving Party to prove otherwise by records and documentation.

. Each Party recognizes the importance of the other’s Confidential Information. In particular, each Party recognizes and agrees that the Confidential Information of the other is critical to their respective businesses and that neither Party would enter into this Agreement without assurance that such information and the value thereof will be protected as provided in this Section 6 and elsewhere in this Agreement. Accordingly, each Party agrees as follows: (a) the Receiving Party will hold any and all Confidential Information it obtains in strictest confidence and will use and permit use of Confidential Information solely for the purposes of this Agreement; (b) the Receiving Party may disclose or provide access to its responsible employees who have a need to know and may make copies of Confidential Information only to the extent reasonably necessary to carry out its obligations hereunder; and (c) the Receiving Party currently has, and for so long as it possesses Confidential Information of the Disclosing Party, it will maintain in effect and enforce, rules and policies to protect against access to or use or disclosure of Confidential Information other than in accordance with this Agreement, including without limitation written instruction to and agreements with employees and agents who are bound by an obligation of confidentiality no less restrictive than set forth in this Agreement to ensure that such employees and agents protect the confidentiality of Confidential Information. The Receiving Party will instruct and require its employees and agents not to disclose Confidential Information to third parties, including without limitation customers, subcontractors or consultants, without the Disclosing Party’s prior written consent; and will notify the Disclosing Party immediately of any unauthorized disclosure or use, and will cooperate with the Disclosing Party to protect all proprietary rights in and ownership of its Confidential Information.

. Each Party acknowledges and agrees that due to the unique nature of Confidential Information there can be no adequate remedy at law for any breach of its obligations hereunder, that any such breach or threatened breach may allow a Party or third parties to unfairly compete with the other Party resulting in irreparable harm to such party, and therefore, that upon any such breach or any threat thereof, each Party will be entitled to appropriate equitable remedies and may seek and obtain injunctive relief from a court of competent jurisdiction without the necessity of proving actual loss or posting of a bond or other security, in addition to whatever remedies either of them might have at law or equity. HealthTap Prime provides primary care virtual consults with doctors licensed in your state for limited diagnosis, care and prescriptions (as appropriate). HealthTap Concierge lets you connect with your doctor for viritual consults using the HelathTap platform, or with other doctors for second opinions or one-time consults for minor conditions that can be addressed and resolved, in the sole opinion of the doctor, via a virtual consult. HealthTap Premium Services can be a great resource between doctor visits, but are not a substitute for in person doctor visits, your primary care doctor or your primary care doctor’s independent judgment about any symptom, condition, or the appropriateness or risks of a procedure or treatment for a given person. HealthTap Prime is not health insurance and is not a substitute for health insurance.

trans-unit.source: “Annual Revenue Minimums” means revenue received by HealthTap (less any applicable Licensee Commission) equivalent to the value of the Minimum Number of Qualified Subscriptions.

trans-unit.source: “End User Groups” means unique employers or organizations with whom Licensee has a business relationship that have not entered into a prior Subscription Agreement with HealthTap or previously Subscribed to the HealthTap Software on behalf of all End User Group Members.
trans-unit.target: “终端用户组”指作为终端用户组成员代表的没有与HealthTap达成优先订阅协议或之前订阅过HealthTap软件的独特的雇主或组织。

trans-unit.source: “Licensee Commission” means the Subscription Agreement Fees collected by HealthTap for Qualified Subscriptions less the Base Fee for such Qualified Subscriptions and any unpaid and due Annual Revenue Minimum.
trans-unit.target: 许可佣金是指HealthTap收集的合格订阅的订阅协议费用减去基础费用和任何未付和过期的最小年收入。

trans-unit.source: “Licensee Landing Page” means a URL to a HealthTap-provided landing page for Licensee’s distribution of the HealthTap Software to End User Groups.
trans-unit.target: “被许可人的登陆页”是指一个给终端用户组的HealthTap软件的许可分发的到HealthTap提供的登陆页面URL。

trans-unit.source: “Licensee Minimum Dates” mean the dates, identified in Exhibit A, by which either HealthTap shall have received the Annual Revenue Minimums; or, if not, the dates on which Licensee agrees that HealthTap may collect the Annual Revenue Minimum from Licensee using payment information provided by Licensee.
trans-unit.target: “被许可人的最小日期”是指被识别的HealthTap收到最低年收入的日期；或者，如果不是这样，被许可人同意HealthTap收集来自被许可人支付信息的最低年收入的日期。

trans-unit.source: “Qualified Subscriptions” means Subscriptions generated by Licensee through Licensee Landing Pages minus any Unqualified Subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: “合格的订阅”是指被持牌人通过持牌人的登陆页面减去任何不合格的订阅所产生的订阅。

trans-unit.source: “Subscription Agreement” means the agreement between HealthTap and an End User Group governing the license of HealthTap Software for all End User Group employees or group members eligible to receive benefits from End User Group (all End User Group Members), the terms of which are subject to change by HealthTap, at its sole discretion.
trans-unit.target: 订阅协议是指为所有终端用户组成员的合理获益而签订的由HealthTap制定条款的HealthTap和一个终端用户组之间的协议。

trans-unit.source: Licensee Commission. Licensee is entitled to the Licensee Commission for all Qualified Subscriptions sold under this Agreement. Within thirty (30) business days of the end of each Reporting Period, HealthTap will provide to Licensee with a Qualified Subscription Report detailing the Licensee Commission due for the Reporting Period, and shall pay any such License Commission due to Licensee. Licensee Commissions are due only after Subscription Agreement payments are received by HealthTap from the related End User Group.
trans-unit.target: 被许可人有权收取这项协议下的所有合格订阅出售得来的被许可佣金。在每个报告周期的30个工作日之内，HealthTap会给被许可人提供一份详述报告期内许可佣金的合格订阅报告并由于被许可人付出相应佣金。被许可佣金仅在HealthTap收到其相关的终端用户组的订阅协议费用后生效。

trans-unit.source: Annual Revenue Minimum. To participate as a Licensee and distributor of the HealthTap Software, Licensee agrees that on or before the Licensee Minimum Date, Licensee shall meet the Annual Revenue Minimum, if any. In the event that HealthTap has not received Annual Revenue Minimums from Licensee Qualified Subscriptions before the Licensee Minimum Date, HealthTap may immediately collect from Licensee, including using payment information provided by Licensee at sign up, the Annual Revenue Minimum, if any, less any Qualified Agreement Subscription Fees collected and retained by HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 如果有参与HealthTap的软件许可和分销商，被许可方同意在最小的许可日期或之前，被许可方应满足最低年收入。如果HealthTap在最小许可日前未收到来自被许可合格订阅的最小年收入，HealthTap会立即从被许可人出收费，包括使用被许可人在注册时提供的付费信息，最小年收入将由留存在HealthTap的已收集的合格订阅协议费用中扣除。

trans-unit.source: Licensee Minimum Date Payments. On the Effective Date, Licensee shall provide payment information to Licensor for the Annual Revenue Minimum, if any. Where any Annual Revenue Minimum exists, such minimum shall not be charged to Licensee if the Licensee generates the Annual Revenue Minimum from Licensee Qualified Subscriptions under this Agreement each year on or before the Licensee Minimum Date.
trans-unit.target: 在有效期内，被许可方应向许可方提供年度最低收入的付款信息。假使任何最低年收入存在，如果在协议下最低被许可日当天或之前被许可人从被许可合格订阅中获得了最低年收入，这样的最低收入不能由被许可人负责。

trans-unit.source: Term. The initial term of this Agreement shall be for one (1) year from the Effective Date (“Initial Term”), and shall automatically renew for additional one (1) year terms (each a “Renewal Term”) unless Licensee provides Licensor with written notice of its intent not to renew at least ninety (90) days prior to any such Renewal Term.
trans-unit.target: 条款。这份协议最初的条款应该是有效期后一年，然后除非被许可方向许可方于更新期90天前提供他意愿的书面通知，它将自动为另外一年更新。

trans-unit.source: “End User Family Members” mean immediate members of the same family, traveling together, up to six individuals.
trans-unit.target: 终端用户家庭会员指的是至多六人一起旅行的同一家庭直接成员。

trans-unit.source: “Subscription” means a new, pre-paid, non-trial, automatically renewing monthly Subscription to the HealthTap Software by a unique End User who did not previously have a Subscription to the HealthTap Software, and generated through a Subscription Agreement with an End User.
trans-unit.target: 订阅是指一个唯一的终端用户之前没有订阅过HealthTap软件的新的、预付的、非实验的、每月自动更新的对HealthTap软件的订阅，它通过一个终端用户与HealthTap签订的订阅协议而生效。

trans-unit.source: “Subscription Agreement” means the agreement between HealthTap and an End User governing the license of HealthTap Software for the End User and all End User Family Members members eligible to receive benefits from End User (all End User Family Members), the terms of which are subject to change by HealthTap, at its sole discretion.
trans-unit.target: 订阅协议指的是HealthTap与有能力从其软件中获益的终端用户或终端家庭会员关于软件使用许可的规定而签订的协议，其中的条款可在HealthTap完全裁量权的情况下受其制约。

trans-unit.source: “Subscription Agreement Fees” means fees collected by HealthTap for Qualified Subscriptions under Subscription Agreements with End User, based on Premium Pricing.
trans-unit.target: “订购协议费用”是指HealthTap根据高级定价在订购协议下对最终用户收取的合格订阅费用。

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions. All Subscriptions pre-purchased by Licensee must be sold to End Users (including End User Family Members), and used not later than December 31, 2016.
trans-unit.target: 由被许可人预先购买的所有订阅都必须销售给最终用户（包括最终用户家庭成员），并在2016年12月31日之前使用。

trans-unit.source: Termination for Convenience. HealthTap may terminate this Agreement for convenience on thirty (30) days notice to Licensee. Such termination shall impact only the Licensee’s ability to sell additional future Subscriptions and the terms under which any pre-purchased or previously sold subscriptions shall remain unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 为了方便，HealthTap可以在通知被许可方后三十（30）天终止本协议。这种终止只会影响被许可方未来销售更多订阅的能力，并且任何预购或以前售出的订阅的条款保持不变。这种终止只会影响被许可方未来销售更多订阅的能力，并且任何预购或以前售出的订阅的条款保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Effect of Termination. In the event of termination of this Agreement, the rights and licenses granted to Licensee hereunder shall immediately terminate and Licensee shall cease to market, distribute or sell the HealthTap Software; in the event of termination of this Agreement by Licensee prior to the end of any term, described above, any fees due to HealthTap hereunder. The provisions of this Agreement governing Ownership, Confidentiality, Limitation of Liability, the Relationship of the Parties, and Miscellaneous Provisions shall survive termination or cancelation of this Agreement for any reason.
trans-unit.target: 如果本协议终止，授予被许可人的权利和许可应立即终止，被许可人停止在市场上营销，分发或售卖HealthTap软件; 如果被许可方在上述任何期限结束前终止本协议，任何费用都根据本协议收取。本协议中规定的所有权，保密性，责任限制，双方关系和其他规定的条款应在本协议终止或取消后仍然有效。

trans-unit.source: 2. Choose one of these available days:

“With a newborn child, it’s hard to do anything or go anywhere such as the medical centre. This app save me the time it would take to go to the doctor when it's not necessary. And when I needed advice late at night, HealthTap docs replied quickly and I didn't need to wait till the next day when the doctors are open.“
trans-unit.target: “有了新生儿，很难做任何事情或去任何地方，如医疗中心。这个程序节省了我去找医生所要花费的时间。当我在深夜需要咨询时，HealthTap文档可迅速回复，我不需要等到第二天医生开门。

trans-unit.source: “My son who's now 12 years old was born with several congenital issues. After several surgeries over the years, he's now a healthy child of 12 years. If I need any help or any tips, I find it on HealthTap, not only for him also for the whole family! It really helps!“
trans-unit.target: 如果我需要任何帮助或任何提示，我发现可在HealthTap获取，它也为整个家庭服务！

trans-unit.source: “I wish I had HealthTap Prime when my mom had a stroke and was in a coma. It would've been amazing to get an immediate second opinion instead of paying $1000 out of pocket. My mom was bed-bound, so I had to coordinate doctor appointments for her, find a handicap-accessible van, then suffer the waiting room with her. Now, I can use HealthTap in minutes for a virtual consult.“
trans-unit.target: 您不用支付$ 1000就可立即获取意见。我的妈妈是在躺在床上的，所以我不得不协调她和医生的会诊，要找到一个残疾人士访问面包车，并提供她的候诊室。

trans-unit.source: “This app has improved my life vastly. I’ve had more questions than answers for a while now. It’s unreasonable to call my doctor every 5 minutes. The caring and expert doctors have been a lifesaver and brought me so much peace of mind!“
trans-unit.target: 关怀和专业的医生一直是救星，带给我这么多的安心！

trans-unit.source: These decisions and choices are yours, and we believe that you, in connection with the advice you receive from your doctor or other professional healthcare provider, are the best decision maker about your health. You should always use common sense when making health decisions, and they should be made in consultation with your doctor. HealthTap cannot make decisions for you. What we can do is help you find good health information and connect with doctors for in-person care. On HealthTap you can ask and find informational questions and related educational answers and tips by Medical Experts. HealthTap is not a place for the practice of medicine, but Medical Experts on HealthTap can be a resource for reliable, relevant general health information. We hope these services will be of value to you. Please use them responsibly.
trans-unit.target: 在做出健康判断时，您应该总是使用常识，并且应该咨询您的医生。我们可以做的是帮助您找到良好的健康信息，并与医生联系以当面关怀。在HealthTap上，您可以询问并找到信息性问题以及相关医疗专家的的教育性的答案和提示。HealthTap不是医疗实践的地方，但HealthTap的医疗专家可以作为可靠，相关的一般健康信息的资源。我们希望这些服务对您有价值。请负责任地使用它们。

trans-unit.source: On HealthTap you can connect privately with a doctor for an online consultation through our Private Conversation feature. trans-unit.source: Accurate and complete registration information is required to use HealthTap. All members are encouraged to use password common sense: safeguard your log in password, pick a password that cannot be guessed by others, keep it private, and periodically change it. You are responsible for the security of your passwords and for any use of your account. Please immediately notify us of any unauthorized use of your password or account. As a part of registration you will create a profile with a Public Profile Name. Like your password, if you wish to remain anonymous, use common sense: safeguard your Public Profile Name, pick a name that cannot be guessed by others, and keep it private. Do not use your real name, or the real name of any one related to you when selecting your Public Profile Name. Allowing any other person or entity to use your identity for posting on or using HealthTap is not permitted. Do not include your real name or any other information that could be used to identify you in anything you post on HealthTap, including questions, comments, or other submissions.

trans-unit.source: Content on the site created, submitted or validated by Medical Experts or other healthcare experts on HealthTap (collectively, "Expert Content") are subject to the following additional terms and conditions. While we hope that you will find the Expert Content informative and educational, neither we nor the Poster make any representations or warranties with respect to any information offered or provided within or through the Expert Content regarding treatment of medical conditions, action, or application of medication. Posters are solely responsible for their content. Under no circumstances, as a result of your use of the Expert Content or this Site, will the Expert Content Poster or such Poster's employer or sponsor be liable to you or to any other person for any damages or harm–including any direct, indirect, special, incidental, exemplary, consequential or other damages under any legal theory, including, without limitation, tort, contract, strict liability or otherwise, even if advised of the possibility of such damages. This means you should not rely on the Expert Content or make medical or other important decisions based on it, and it also means that the Posters are not responsible for what you do or don't do with the Content. For medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis, see your personal doctor or expert healthcare provider. You agree to indemnify and hold the Poster (and the Poster's employer and/or sponsor) harmless from any claim or demand, including attorneys' fees, made by any third party as a result of (1) any content posted or made available by you through Expert Content, (2) any violation of law that occurs by you through your use of Expert Content or this Site, and/or (3) anything you do using Expert Content, this Site and/or the information contained therein.
trans-unit.target: 由医疗专家或其他健康专家在HealthTap上所创建，提交或验证的网站上的内容（统称为“专家内容”）需遵守以下附加条款和条件。（当我们使用术语“内容”时，这一术语即专家内容。）作者或发布此类内容的第三方（“海报”）对其内容负全部责任。虽然我们希望您觉得专业内容的很有帮助，但我们和海报对于在专家内容所提供的任何关于医疗条件，行动或应用药物的信息的不做出任何声明或保证 。在不限制以上所述的一般性的情况下，海报（以及此类海报的雇主和／或供应商）对HealthTap没有任何责任：（a）全部或部分由海报的行为、疏漏、疏忽，在采购、编辑或提供信息期间或通过专家内容所造成的损失或损害；（b）不管由什么所引起的此类信息的错误、疏漏或不精确，或传递信息的推迟及间断；（c）依赖于此类信息的任何决定的形成或行动的采取或不采取。这意味着您不应该依赖于专家内容以及在此基础上做重要的医学或其他方面的决定，这同时意味着海报对于您对内容做的或不做的不负责任。对于医疗建议、治疗或诊断，请咨询您的私人医生或专业医务人员。您同意赔偿并保持海报（以及海报的雇主和／或供应商）免于由任何第三方作出的索赔或要求，包括律师费，因为（1）您通过专家内容发布或提供的任何内容，（2）您使用专家内容或这一网站所违反的法律，（3）您使用专家内容、应用程序及其包含的信息所做的一切。

trans-unit.source: As a HealthTap Medical Expert, you are required to register with and use your real name and (if you choose to upload a picture) a real image of you in your Virtual Practice.
trans-unit.target: 作为HealthTap医疗专家，您需要在您的虚拟实践中注册并使用您的真实姓名和（如果您选择上传图片）真实的形象。

trans-unit.source: Licensed doctors may apply to be and participate as Medical Experts on HealthTap. Physicians whose licenses are or become suspended or revoked, for any reason, are not permitted and agree not to participate in any way, including but not limited to submitting Content to HealthTap, as a Medical Expert on HealthTap. HealthTap may expand the network to include other licensed medical experts.
trans-unit.target: 执业医师可以申请并作为医学专家加入HealthTap。许可证被许可因任何原因或被吊销或撤销的医生是不允许申请，也同意不以任何方式参与，包括将内容提交到HealthTap作为HealthTap的医疗专家也不被允许。HealthTap可以扩展网络以包括其他授权的医学专家

trans-unit.source: You retain the right to edit and delete your own Expert Submissions that appear in your Virtual Practice at any time. You also retain the right to use and create derivative works from your own Expert Submissions elsewhere (such as on your own practice website, blog, or in your own social media posts).
trans-unit.target: 您保留随时编辑和删除您的虚拟实践中显示的专家提交的权利。您同样也拥有从您自己的专家意见书的其他地方（如在您自己的实践网站，博客，或在您自己的社交媒体网站）使用和创建衍生作品的权利。

trans-unit.source: When a HealthTap Medical Expert submissions related to any HealthTap feature or function and made for publication on HealthTap (such as an answer to a question) (an "Expert Submission"), you grant HealthTap an unrestricted right without limitation to use, reproduce, extract data from or add data to, publish and post any such Expert Submissions, including in connection with or on HealthTap, including in connection with your name. This means that when you make such a submission to us, you are giving us rights to this content, including the right to post it on HealthTap and use it in connection with HealthTap. You also give us the right to give or transfer all rights granted herein to others. While Expert Submissions generally are posted to HealthTap, we do not have an obligation to post any particular Expert Submission on HealthTap and reserve the right, at our sole discretion and for any reason whatsoever (including but not limited to an Expert Submission being reported to us), to not post and/or to remove any Expert Submissions at any time.
trans-unit.target: 当一位HealthTap的医学专家的提交文件与任何HealthTap的特性或作用有关并在HealthTap上（作为问题的回复）、（专家回应）发布，您已同意并授权HealthTap无限制地使用、复制、从中提取或添加数据后发布任何包括与HealthTap或您的名字连接的专家意见。这意味着，当您做出这样的提交给我们的同时，您给我们包括有权发布在HealthTap或使用它与HealthTap链接的权利。您也给我们权利授予或转让再此授予他人的所有权利。专家的意见一般都公布到HealthTap，我们没有义务在HealthTap上特别公布某位专家的意见并保留其权利。以我们的判断和以任何理由（包括但不限于专家提交的报告给我们），不发布或随时删除任何专家的意见。

trans-unit.source: So that everyone can enjoy HealthTap, we have rules for Content in Public Areas. A few things you should know:
trans-unit.target: 为了让大家可以更好地使用HealthTap，我们有公共区域内容的规则。您应该知道的几件事：

trans-unit.source: HealthTap answers should be relevant content that is educational and informational. Answers can provide general guidance, context, and illustration. You are welcome to refer to general medical conditions, symptoms and treatments, but please do not diagnose any individual member or prescribe any specific treatment in your answers. Individualized or diagnostic answers are not allowed and prescribing medications is not allowed. Answers should not provide specific treatment recommendations or give the impression that they are a substitute for a real-life consultation with a doctor. YOU ARE NOT PERMITTED TO PRACTICE MEDICINE ON OR THROUGH HEALTHTAP, EVEN IF YOU ARE INTERACTING WITH AN ACTUAL PATIENT OF YOURS. ALL MEDICAL DIAGNOSIS, TREATMENT, PRESCRIPTION AND ACTUAL CARE MUST OCCUR OFF HEALTHTAP, REGARDLESS OF ANY EXISTING RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN THE PARTIES.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的答案应该是与教育和信息相关的内容。答案可以提供一般指导，情况和说明。欢迎您参考一般的医疗状况，症状和治疗方法，但请不要以您的答案来诊断任何个人会员或规定任何特定的治疗。个性化或判断性的答案是不被允许的，并且处方药物是不允许的。答案不应该提供特定的治疗建议或给人留下他们能代替现实生活中向医生咨询的印象。您不允许通过HEALTHTAP行医，即使您是与您实际的病人进行交流。所有医疗诊断，治疗，处方和实际护理都不被允许在HEALTHTAP上发生，无论任何现有的关系之间的缔约方。

trans-unit.source: Feel free to interact professionally with members and create long-lasting relationships with those in your community. However, help us keep the personal information of our members confidential. Please don’t refer to members in or on Content in Public Areas by their real names, even if this information has been disclosed to you.
trans-unit.target: 您可以随时专门与会员进行交流并且可以与您社区里的人创造持久的关系。但是，帮助我们保守我们会员的个人信息。请不要在公共领域的内容中用会员的真实姓名提及他们，即使这些信息已经向您公开。

trans-unit.source: Responses should always be appropriate. Brief, casual, and friendly responses are the most useful. Help HealthTap remain a trusted resource, by avoiding potentially offensive content whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: 回复应该总是适当的。简短，非正式和友好的反应是最有用的。通过尽可能的避免潜在的攻击性内容，帮助HealthTap保持为值得信赖的资源。

trans-unit.source: Feel Free to share your professional clinical expertise though answers that are evidence-based and consistent with accepted standards in the medical community. HealthTap is for general questions. Refrain from using language that suggests an answer is provided for a single member. Unless you are in a Private Conversation with a user on HealthTap, refrain from answering questions that solicit your individual opinion as a single Medical Expert. Avoid answering questions or providing answers that suggest a duty of care and a doctor-patient relationship.
trans-unit.target: 自由地分享您的专业临床专业知识，当然那是基于证据和符合医疗界的公认标准内。HealthTap是为一般性问题。避免使用那些能够表明答案是由一个会员提供的语言。除非您是以私人谈话的形式与一个用户在HealthTap交流，否则作为一个医学专家避免回答那些征求您个人意见的问题。避免回答问题或提供关于照顾的义务和医生与患者关系的建议。

trans-unit.source: You are allowed to link to external websites that are both appropriate and related to your responses, but answers on HealthTap should be complete and should not be used for primarily promotional purposes. Please do not plagiarize and cite sources where applicable. Using answers as a vehicle to promote a product or service is prohibited. Providing members with useful and beneficial information and attracting new patients through useful Content is permitted, but mere schilling is not.
trans-unit.target: 您可以链接到适当的并且和您的回应相关的外部网站上，但在HealthTap上的答案应该完成，并且不应该用作主要以促销为目的。请不要剽窃和适用的引用来源。禁止使用答案作为宣传产品或服务的工具。为会员提供有用的并且有益的信息，通过被允许的有用的内容来吸引新病人，但仅仅是先令并非如此。

trans-unit.source: Patients on HealthTap can find your professional contact information through your Virtual Practice, and can contact you for an appointment. However, please avoid violating medical board rules regarding advertising and patient solicitation.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap的患者可以通过虚拟实践找到您的专业联系信息，并且可以通过预约联系您。然而，请避免违反医学委员会关于广告和病人征集的规定。

trans-unit.source: Avoid other actions that violate board or other rules that apply to you.
trans-unit.target: 避免其他违反董事会的行为或适用于您的其他规则。

trans-unit.source: All other information, including suggestions, feedback, ideas, concepts and any other materials you disclose or offer to us on or in connection with HealthTap or any Content, are governed by the general member submission terms of this Agreement. This means that these submissions are made without any restrictions and without any expectation of confidentiality or compensation. You agree not to assert any property right or moral right of any kind with respect to any such submissions. You agree to our standard terms governing media submissions, except for the prohibition against uploading a facial portrait image of yourself for your Virtual Practice picture.
trans-unit.target: 包括建议、反馈、想法、概念和其他您披露或提供给我们的材料或与HealthTap相关的或由普通会员提交的本协议条款的任何内容，在内的所有其他信息。这意味着这些提交是没有任何限制,也没有任何保密或补偿期望的。您同意对这样的提交不维护任何产权或任何形式的道德权利。您同意我们的标准条款执政媒体投稿，除了禁止我们对你自己上传的脸部肖像图像的虚拟实践的图片的使用。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap permits Medical Experts to receive questions directly from specific members in Private Conversations. You will receive compensation for participating in Private Conversations according to the additional terms of the [HealthTap License Agreement and Business Associate Agreement], which are incorporated herein by reference.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap允许医学专家直接在私人的谈话收到特定会员所提的问题。根据附加条款[HealthTap的许可协议和业务合作协议]，您将收到补偿通过加入私人的谈话，所有这一切都被引入作为参考。

trans-unit.source: Medical Experts may not post Content to Public Areas on HealthTap in exchange for compensation of any kind, including but not limited to as a paid consultant to any entity (including any company or organization) or individual. Medical Experts should ensure that any conflict or potential conflict of interest does not affect or appear to affect his or her contributions of Content to the HealthTap. Medical Experts may receive compensation for Private Conversations on or through HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 医疗专家不得将内容发布到HealthTap的公共区域，以换取任何形式的赔偿，包括但不限于作为任何实体（包括任何公司或组织）或个人的付费顾问。医学专家应该确保任何冲突或潜在的利益冲突都不影响或不能影响他/她在HealthTap咨询平台上所贡献的内容。通过在HealthTap的私人对话，医疗专家可以获得补偿。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap licenses our online and mobile platform to doctors who accept invitations to engage in Private Conversations between doctors and consumers.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap将我们的在线和移动平台授权给接受医生和消费者之间私人对话邀请的医生。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap provides an online tool for doctors to provide consumers with quality health and healthcare related information.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap为医生提供了一个在线工具，同时也为消费者提供高质量的与健康和医疗相关的信息。

trans-unit.source: You may upload appropriate content to HealthTap and rights in submissions to HealthTap are governed by the HealthTap Terms of Use. Information in your Virtual Practice and any submissions to a Public Area of HealthTap are not confidential. Outside of these, we ask that you keep confidential all information exchanged between us and all information exchanged between you and HealthTap members in Private Conversations. You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations when you use HealthTap, including necessary privacy and HIPAA requirements.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将相应的内容上传到HealthTap，提交到HealthTap的权利受HealthTap使用条款的约束。您的虚拟实践中的信息和HealthTap公共区域的任何提交信息将不会保密。除此之外，我们要求您保密我们之间交换的所有信息和您与HealthTap成员之间在私人对话中交换的所有信息。您同意在使用HealthTap时遵守所有适用的法律和法规，包括必要的隐私和HIPAA要求。

trans-unit.source: , a Delaware corporation, having its principal place of business at 270 University Ave., 2nd Floor, Palo Alto, CA 94301 or as otherwise indicated on the Contact section of the
trans-unit.target: 比如，一家特拉华州公司，主要营业地点在270 University Ave.，2nd Floor，Palo Alto，CA 94301，或以其他方式在个人资料中显示。

trans-unit.source: means all confidential and proprietary information, whether received orally, in writing, or by or through a product, that is designated as confidential or that reasonably should be understood to be confidential given the nature of the information and the circumstances of disclosure. Confidential Information includes the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Participant submissions, information, and data, the HealthTap Services, and HealthTap’s: technology and technical information, product designs, business and marketing plans, and business processes. Confidential Information excludes any information that: (i) is or becomes generally known to the public without breach of any obligation owed to HealthTap; (ii) was known to Subscriber prior to its disclosure by the HealthTap without breach of any obligation owed to the HealthTap; (iii) was independently developed by Subscriber without breach of any obligation owed to HealthTap; or (iv) is received from a third party without breach of any obligation owed to HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 不论是经口头，书面还是通过产品被指定为机密或根据信息的性质和披露的情况理应合理地保密的所有机密和专有信息。机密信息包括本协议，参与者提交，信息和数据，HealthTap的服务条款和条件：技术和技术信息，产品设计，业务和营销计划和业务流程。（i）是公众已知的或普遍知道的，而不违反对HealthTap的任何义务; （ii）在HealthTap披露之前已为订户所知，且不违反对HealthTap的任何义务; （iii）由订户独立开发，且不违反对HealthTap的任何义务; （iv）从第三方收到，而不违反对HealthTap的任何义务。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap grants to Subscriber a personal and nontransferable, nonexclusive, worldwide, and nonsublicenseable license, during the Term: (1) to access and use HealthTap in connection with Private Conversations with Participants for which Subscriber will charge a fee for each Private Conversation (as amended or updated from time to time, the "Conversation Fee") to be paid by Participant in advance of each Private Conversation and (2) to use the HealthTap’s Marks for the sole purpose of identifying and promoting the HealthTap Services (defined below). This license is subject to Subscriber’s compliance with the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement. HealthTap may withdraw any approval of any use of the HealthTap Marks at any time in its discretion. Subscriber shall not make any express or implied statement or suggestion, or use the HealthTap Marks in any manner, that dilutes, tarnishes, degrades, disparages or otherwise reflects adversely on HealthTap or its business, products, services or the HealthTap Marks.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在期限内向用户授予个人和不可转让，非独占性，全球性和不可分许可的权利：（1）在与参与者的私人对话中访问和使用HealthTap，将为每个开通私人对话的用户收取费用（不时修改或更新“对话费”），且每个私人对话的费用需要由参与者提前支付（2）使用HealthTap的标记，唯一的目的是识别和促进HealthTap服务（定义如下）。此许可证需遵守订阅者遵守本协议中规定的条款和条件。HealthTap可以随时自行决定撤回任何使用HealthTap标志的任何批准。订阅者不得以任何方式对HealthTap或其业务，产品，服务或HealthTap标志作出任何明示或暗示，或以任何方式对HealthTap标志进行玷污，降级，贬损等。

trans-unit.source: Participants can pay for Private Conversations, and HealthTap shall collect these Conversation Fees. Subscribers can also provide Participants with a promotional code, which allow for a Private Conversation without a Conversation Fee (when such promotional codes are used, Subscriber shall not receive any compensation for any such interaction). Conversation Fees collected from Participants will be distributed to Subscriber by check or money transfer (using a service such as PayPal) after both (i) the total of the Subscriber’s Conversation Fees exceeds $100 (each a "Payment Distribution") and (ii) Subscriber request, and such distribution to Subscriber shall be the total of all collected Conversation Fees minus the applicable License and Subscription Fees. Conversation Fees and License and Subscription Fees are subject to adjustment pursuant to HealthTap policies and procedures
trans-unit.target: 参与者可以支付私人对话，HealthTap应收取这些对话费。订阅者还可以向参与者提供促销代码，允许在没有对话费的情况下进行私人对话（当使用此类促销代码时，订阅者不会因任何此类交互而获得任何补偿）。当（i）订户的对话费用总额超过100美元（每个为“付款分配”）和（ii）订阅者的要求和所有收集的对话费减去适用的许可和订阅费用的总和时，向参与者所收取的对话费会分发给订阅者来确认费用（比如使用paypal等服务）对话费和许可费和订阅费可根据HealthTap政策和程序进行调整。

trans-unit.source: Subscriber shall make best efforts to respond promptly to all Private Conversation requests. Subscriber is responsible and liable for all activities that occur in each Private Conversation, and: (i) has sole responsibility for all information provided in a Private Conversation, including the quality, accuracy, reliability, specificity, legality and appropriateness of the information; (ii) shall conduct each Private Conversation in adherence with HealthTap’s policies and procedures and, each as updated and amended from time to time; (iii) Subscriber shall not provide individual treatment recommendations or diagnosis in any Private Conversation; and (iv) Subscriber shall comply with any disclosure or disclaimer requirements of HealthTap. HealthTap will store archives of each Private Conversation, information on Participants, and Subscriber for at least the required legal period after each Private Conversation.
trans-unit.target: 用户应尽最大努力迅速响应所有私人对话请求。订阅者应对每次私下交谈中发生的所有活动负责，并且：（i）对私人会话中提供的所有信息负全部责任，包括信息的质量，准确性，可靠性，特异性，合法性和适当性; （ii）按照HealthTap的政策和程序进行每个私人对话，并且不时更新和修改; （iii）认购人不得在任何私人会谈中提供个别治疗建议或诊断; （iv）认购人须遵守HealthTap的任何披露或免责声明规定。HealthTap将在每次私下交谈后存储每个私人对话的档案，参与者信息和订阅者至少所需的法定期限。

trans-unit.source: Subscriber represents and warrants that the biographical information set forth in the Profile is true, correct and complete, and, Subscriber agrees to update Subscriber’s Profile immediately upon any updates to the information contained therein. In the event of any breach of the provisions of this Article 4, HealthTap and/or any of its parents, subsidiaries and affiliated entities, in addition to any other remedies available to them for such breach, including the recovery of damages, shall be entitled to injunctive relief to change any information in the Profile.
trans-unit.target: 订户声明并保证，个人资料中提供的履历信息是真实，正确和完整的，并且用户同意在其中包含的信息更新后立即更新订户的资料。如果发生任何违反本第4条规定的情况，HealthTap和/或其任何主公司，子公司和附属实体，除了任何其他补救措施可用于这种违约，包括恢复损害赔偿，应有权利得到禁令救济改变任何信息在配置文件。

trans-unit.source: As set forth in Exhibit A, Subscriber shall pay to HealthTap a fee for each Private Conversation as consideration for the license and HealthTap Services described in this Agreement (collectively and as adjusted from time to time, the "License and Subscription Fees"), which amount may be adjusted from time to time. The License and Subscription Fees are immediately due and owning at the time Subscriber accepts a Private Conversation request. The License and Subscription Fees are subject to adjustment pursuant to HealthTap policies and procedures. HealthTap’s fees do not include, and Subscriber is responsible for paying, any direct or indirect local, state, federal or foreign taxes, levies, duties or similar governmental assessments of any nature associated with Subscriber’s activities.

Subscriber agrees not to upload or transmit any Content that (i) infringes another’s rights, (ii) is confidential, (iii) contains offensive content (including hate-speech, obscenity, and pornography), or any material that could give rise to any civil or criminal liability under applicable law or regulations, or (iv) contains software viruses or any other computer code, files or programs designed to interrupt, destroy or limit the functionality of any computer software or HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap和订阅者之间，HealthTap和/或参与者拥有由任何参与者提交给HealthTap的与私人对话相关的所有内容（包括电子数据或信息）的所有权利，所有权和利益，这些提交被视为机密信息；根据本协议，并受HealthTap的使用条款和隐私声明的约束。订阅者内容（包括上传到HealthTap的内容）需遵守HealthTap的使用条款和隐私权声明。订阅者同意不会上传或传输（i）侵犯他人的权利，（ii）保密，（iii）包含攻击性内容（包括仇恨言论，淫秽内容和色情内容）或任何可能引起任何 民事或刑事责任，或（iv）包含设计用于中断，破坏或限制任何计算机软件或HealthTap的功能的软件病毒或任何其他计算机代码，文件或程序。

trans-unit.source: Subscriber shall use HealthTap solely as contemplated by this Agreement and shall not: (i) license, sublicense, sell, resell, rent, lease, transfer, assign, distribute, time share or otherwise commercially exploit or make HealthTap available to any third party, except as otherwise contemplated by this Agreement; (ii) send duplicative or unsolicited messages in violation of applicable laws; (iii) send or store infringing, obscene, threatening, libelous, or otherwise unlawful or tortuous material, including material that is harmful to children or violates third party privacy rights; (iv) send or store Malicious Code on or through HealthTap; (v) interfere with or disrupt the integrity or performance of HealthTap or the data contained therein; or (vi) attempt to gain unauthorized access to HealthTap or its related systems or networks.
trans-unit.target: 用户应仅使用本协议来设想HealthTap，且不得：（i）除本协议另有规定外，向任何第三方提供许可，再许可，出售，转售，出租，租赁，转让，转让，分发，分时或以其他方式商业利用或提供HealthTap; （ii）发送违反适用法律的重复或非请求邮件; （iii）发送或存储侵犯，淫秽，威胁，诽谤或其他非法或曲折的材料，包括对儿童有害或违反第三方隐私权的材料; （iv）在HealthTap上或通过HealthTap发送或存储恶意代码; （v）干扰或破坏HealthTap或其中包含的数据的完整性或性能; （vi）尝试未经授权访问HealthTap或其相关系统或网络。

trans-unit.source: Without the prior consent of HealthTap, during the Term of this Agreement and for a period of one (1) year following the termination of this Agreement, Subscriber shall not, directly or indirectly: (A) for Subscriber or on behalf or in conjunction with others, develop or serve as the primary owner of any business which is in competition with HealthTap or (B) enter into any other agreement or other arrangement (written or oral) with a party other than HealthTap or its affiliates to license services or provide Private Conversations similar to those described in this Agreement; provided, however, these restrictions shall not prohibit Subscriber from practicing medicine or performing services for Subscriber’s employer or otherwise that are disclosed in writing to HealthTap prior to the Effective Date.
trans-unit.target: 未经HealthTap事先授权同意，在本协议期限内以及本协议终止后一（1）年内，用户不得直接或间接：（A）为订户或代表他人或与他人一起，发展或作为与HealthTap竞争的业务的主要所有者，（B）与一方订立任何其他协议或其他安排（书面或口头），除了HealthTap或其附属公司的许可服务或提供类似于本协议中所述的私人对话; 但是，这些限制不得禁止用户在生效日期之前向HealthTap以书面形式向执行医生或为认购人的雇主执行服务。

trans-unit.source: Either party may terminate this Agreement without cause upon thirty (30) days written notice; upon such termination by Subscriber, Subscriber agrees not to participate in any further Private Conversations on HealthTap and any such participation shall reinstate this agreement; upon such termination by HealthTap, Subscriber agrees not to participate in any further Private Conversations on HealthTap. This Agreement may be terminated with cause (i) upon thirty (30) days written notice by non-breaching party of a material breach to the breaching party if such breach remains uncured at the expiration of such period; (ii) immediately, if a party becomes the subject of a petition in bankruptcy or any other proceeding relating to insolvency, receivership, liquidation or assignment for the benefit of creditors, (iii) immediately, upon notice by HealthTap upon a breach of any of Sections 3, 4 or 7(D).
trans-unit.target: 任何一方均可在三十（30）天书面通知后立即终止本协议; 在订户终止后，订户同意不再参与HealthTap上的任何进一步私人对话，任何此类参与都将恢复本协议; 在HealthTap终止后，用户同意不再参加HealthTap上的任何进一步私人对话。本协议可能因以下原因被终止：（i）如果违约行为在违约行为期限届满时仍未得到解决，则违约方在三十（30）天内书面通知重大违约行为; （ii）如果一方成为破产申请或与破产，接管，清算或转让有关的债权人的任何其他诉讼的主体，（iii）在HealthTap违反任何第3，4或7（D）条。

trans-unit.source: Each party represents and warrants that it has the legal power to enter into this Agreement. This Agreement does not create a partnership, joint venture, agency, fiduciary or employment relationship between the parties. This Agreement is the entire agreement between Subject and HealthTap relating to its subject matter, and replaces any prior agreements concerning its subject matter. If there is any conflict between this agreement and a mutually signed written agreement between HealthTap and Subscriber related to HealthTap, the signed written agreement will control. If HealthTap provides a translation of the English language version of this agreement, the English language version of this agreement will control if there is any conflict. If HealthTap chooses not to enforce any provision of this Agreement, HealthTap retains the right to enforce it in the future. This means that the failure to enforce any provision of this Agreement does not constitute a waiver of that provision. If any provision in this Agreement is found to be unenforceable, it and any related provisions will be interpreted to best accomplish the essential purpose of any unenforceable provision. Neither party may assign any of its rights or obligations hereunder without the prior written consent of the other party (not to be unreasonably withheld); provided, however, HealthTap may assign this Agreement without consent of Subscriber, in connection with a merger, acquisition, corporate reorganization, or sale of all or substantially all of its assets. Any attempt by a party to assign its rights or obligations under this Agreement in breach of this section shall be void. Subject to the foregoing, this Agreement shall bind and inure to the benefit successors and permitted assigns. This agreement is governed by California law, excluding California's choice-of-law rules. THE EXCLUSIVE VENUE FOR ANY DISPUTE RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT IS SANTA CLARA COUNTY, CALIFORNIA. YOU AND US CONSENT TO THE PERSONAL JURISDICTION OF THESE COURTS. Nothing in this agreement limits either party's ability to seek equitable relief. All notices under this Agreement shall be in writing and shall be deemed to have been given upon: (i) personal delivery; (ii) the second business day after mailing; (iii) the second business day after sending by confirmed facsimile; or (iv) if by HealthTap to Subscriber, the second business day after sending by email. Notices shall be directed to the party’s current known address, and if by email to HealthTap, to: notice@healthtap.com.

trans-unit.target: 是。有关我们如何保护您个人身份信息，详情请参阅

We keep this information private by not displaying it or sharing it. We keep this information secure, using state of the art encryption among other security measures. More information about our security can be found on our
trans-unit.target: 个人身份信息是指可以确认您身份的信息。

trans-unit.source: Yes. You can edit the data in your Health Activity by changing or deleting it at any time. The changes you make are permanent. You will be asked to confirm any changes or deletions from your Health Activity before they are made final.

As this example shows, some of the information stored in you Health Activity is displayed in your Public Profile. Your real name, and other Personally Identifiable Information, are never shown in your Public Profile (unless you put it there). You can turn off sharing of various site features, including Health Activity sharing, at any time.

trans-unit.source: Yes. Every user of HealthTap, whether or not the user is a caregiver or care recipient, must have a different account. Currently, a parent may add a separate child’s account through their account.

Yes. You can close your account at any time by signing into your HealthTap account and choosing “Delete Account” from your Account Settings. You will receive an e-mail confirming that your account has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 是。您能随时通过登录您的HealthTap账户并在账户设置中选择“删除账户”来关闭您的账户。

Yes. After you sign up for HealthTap, we will send you a message welcoming you to our community and thanking you for joining us. After that, HealthTap may occasionally send messages to your HealthTap Messages Box, or to an e-mail address you provide to us. No one likes Spam, we do not send our users Spam, and we have a strict No-Spam policy. As described elsewhere in this Privacy Statement, HealthTap may also send you notifications (which you can turn off) and important messages to the e-mail address listed in your Account Settings.
trans-unit.target: 是。在您注册了HealthTap账户后，我们将会向您发送邮件欢迎您加入我们的社区，同时对您的加入表达感谢。

Messages will appear in your HealthTap Messages Box. Additionally, your e-mail address will be used to notify you that you have a message on HealthTap. You can turn off this notifications feature at any time through your Account Settings.

Questions and answers on HealthTap are for general education and information. Only general, informational questions are permitted. For specific, personal health questions, always ask your own doctor or healthcare provider. (HealthTap Medical Experts are not your personal doctor or healthcare provider, and their answers to questions are not personal or for personal use.)
trans-unit.target: 对于具体的、私人的健康问题，请您咨询您的私人医生或是医疗保健提供者。（HealthTap的医疗专家不是您的私人医生或是医疗保健提供者，他们对于问题的答案也不是针对个人的或是可用作私人的。）

trans-unit.source: . If we are unable to remove this information for any reason, we will let you know that we are unable to do so and why. You can control what is visible in your Public Profile through your Account Settings.

Aggregated information is information from multiple users that is not associated with any individual user account, statistics are summaries of information, not associated with any individual user account, and de-identified data does not include Personally Identifiable Information, such as first and last names or e-mail addresses. Aggregated information and de-identified data and statistics are used to run our service. We may use aggregated information or de-identified data gathered from HealthTap and related statistics to improve the services provided through HealthTap, and for research and analysis. We may also provide this information to our partners for such purposes.
trans-unit.target: 聚集的信息和去可识别性的数据和统计被用来经营我们的服务。我们会使用从HealthTap收集的聚合信息或去可识别性数据以及相关统计来改善服务，增进研究和分析。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap offers information to support the health decisions that you decide to make, in connection with the medical advice and guidance you receive from your doctor. The choices you make are yours. HealthTap does not provide medical advice, is not a doctor, and the information on HealthTap should not be used to delay or replace professional medical treatment. HealthTap does not make recommendations or endorsements. Please see our
trans-unit.target: HealthTap提供与您的医生做出的医疗建议和指导相联系的信息以支持您做出的健康决定。HealthTap不提供建议或推荐。

trans-unit.source: Yes. You can edit or delete information in your Health Activity by signing in to your HealthTap account and editing your Health Activity. Once you edit or delete a record, you cannot retrieve the prior record.
trans-unit.target: 是。您能通过登录您的HealthTap账户并编辑健康活动来对其信息进行编辑或删除。

trans-unit.source: Yes. While every user will be able to see basic information about you, such as your Public Profile Name and your Public Profile Picture, you can control what other information is shown about you through your Privacy & Sharing tab in your Settings.
. More information about our security measures is located on our

The security of your personal information is a top priority for us. We are committed to protecting the security of your personal information. Experts design our security measures, and we use a variety of technologies and procedures to help protect the security of your personal information from unauthorized access, use, and disclosure. For example, information transferred between you and the site is encrypted. We restrict access to personal information to HealthTap employees, contractors, and agents who need to know that information in order to operate, develop, or improve our services. These individuals are bound by confidentiality obligations and may be subject to discipline, including termination and criminal prosecution, if they fail to meet these obligations. No method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure, however. Therefore, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. If you have any specific questions about security on our Site, please see our
trans-unit.target: 我们严格限制需要了解个人信息以运营、开发或改进我们的服务的HealthTap的员工、承包商和代理商获取这些信息。这些个人受保密义务的约束，如果他们没有尽到这些义务将会受到包括终止业务和犯罪起诉在内的法律的制约。然而没有一种网络传输或电子储存的方法是100%安全的。

trans-unit.source: Currently, we only let you provide us with information about you (except in the case of a Caregiver providing information about a Care Recipient). This Privacy Statement applies to this information. In the future, we may allow users to provide us with information by or through other separately operated products or services.
trans-unit.target: 目前我们仅让您提供关于您的信息（除非护理者提供护理接受者信息的情况）。

trans-unit.source: This Privacy Statement does not apply to other service providers or links to other sites that are not owned or controlled by HealthTap, and you should read the individual privacy polices and terms of service of these providers before using their services. We encourage you to contact us if you believe a provider is not protecting the privacy or security of your health and wellness information. You may contact us in writing at:
trans-unit.target: 如果您认为一名服务提供者没有保护您的健康信息的隐私和安全，请您联系我们。

trans-unit.source: Some users may want to share personal information with a Service Provider. You can always do this on your own. If we allow this in the future, before you share any information with a Service Provider through HealthTap, we will require you to confirm that you agree to any such sharing.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们在未来允许这项行动，我们会在您通过HealthTap与服务提供商分享任何信息之前要求您确认您同意这些分享行为。

trans-unit.source: We are committed to protecting the privacy of children. This Site is not intended or designed for children under the age of 13. We do not collect Personally Identifiable Information from any person we actually know is a child under the age of 13. A Caregiver may use this site for a Care Recipient who is under the age of 13, but the Care Recipient may not enter any Personally Identifiable Information into the site – all such information must be entered by the Caregiver.
trans-unit.target: 我们致力于保护儿童的隐私。我们不收集获知的年龄低于13岁的儿童的个人身份可识别信息。我们不会收集任何13岁以下儿童的个人身份信息。

trans-unit.source: An Introductory Consult is a "meet and greet" for customers who are not yet your patients. Please provide only advice in these sessions. At your discretion, and as appropriate under applicable medical standards (including following an in-person visit where required), you may accept them as a patients. With patients, you may provide treatment, write prescriptions, or suggest checklists. Patients will also be able to make additional appointments with you through your Virtual Practice.

trans-unit.resname: GUIDELINES To ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.source: GUIDELINES To ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.target: 指南 要提出一个优秀的HealthTap问题，请使用这些有帮助的指南

trans-unit.resname:
Sweat the details... at least a little. Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.source:
Sweat the details... at least a little. Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?

trans-unit.resname:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?
trans-unit.source:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?

trans-unit.resname:
Include sex/gender, when relevant. Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.source:
Include sex/gender, when relevant. Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?

trans-unit.resname:
Include an approximate age. Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.source:
Include an approximate age. Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?

trans-unit.resname:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant. Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.source:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant. Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?

trans-unit.resname:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication. Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.source:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication. Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?

trans-unit.resname:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer. Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?
trans-unit.source:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer. Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?

trans-unit.resname:
Try to leave opinions out. Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.source:
Try to leave opinions out. Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?

trans-unit.resname:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang. Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.source:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang. Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?

trans-unit.resname:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions. Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.source:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions. Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?

trans-unit.resname:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue). Show examples
Good: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good: Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.source:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue). Show examples
Good: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good: Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.

trans-unit.resname:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing. Show examples
Good: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.source:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing. Show examples
Good: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?

trans-unit.resname:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap. Show examples
Good: I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
trans-unit.source:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap. Show examples
Good: I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
