trans-unit.resname:
These terms (the “Free Trial Terms”) govern the offer (the “Prime Free Trial Offer”) by HealthTap to New Qualified Users to access to the HealthTap Prime Service upon signing up and submitting payment information for a new HealthTap Prime account (the “Free Trial Period”). By submitting your payment details, you accept the Prime Free-Trial Offer and: (i) consent to our use of your payment information in accordance with our Payment Details Terms, and (ii) acknowledge and agree to the HealthTap Terms of Use and these Free Trial Terms. If you decide that you do not want to become a paying user of HealthTap Prime under the standard HealthTap Prime Terms in effect at the end of the Free Trial Period, you must cancel your HealthTap Prime Subscription (in the Billing Settings section of your HealthTap account Settings) before the end of the Free Trial Period. Subscription fees are not prorated; cancellations after the termination of the Free Trial Period will remain active through the end of the trial length period during which the account is canceled. You may only use this Free Trial Offer once. HealthTap reserves the right, in its absolute discretion, to determine individual eligibility for this Prime Free-Trial Offer and to withdraw or to modify this Prime Trial Offer and/or the Free Trial Terms at any time, without prior notice and with no liability.

Payment Details Terms: When you sign up for a trial or any of our Premium Services, or make other purchases through the Apps, your credit card information and other financial data needed to process your payment are collected and stored by third party payment processors, and we may collect some limited information, such as your postal code and transaction history details. The use of your data by any such third party payment processors is subject to their privacy policies. These third parties generally provide us with some limited information (such as a unique token that enables you to make additional purchases using the information they’ve stored, and your card’s type, expiration date, and last four digits).

See the HealthTap Terms of Use for the definitions of “HealthTap,” “HealthTap Prime,” “Apps,” and “Premium Services.” “New Qualified Users” means new HealthTap Prime customers without a prior primary or sub-account or trial account on HealthTap Prime.

Please note that the following prescriptions are not currently available via HealthTap Prime: narcotics or DEA controlled substances (Schedule I, II, III, IV), psychiatric or lifestyle medications (such as diet or erectile dysfunction drugs), or medications restricted by individual states.
trans-unit.source:

trans-unit.resname: Only <span class="dollar-wrap">

RateRx is a new, independent resource for doctors and patients alike, that presents ratings of medication effectiveness as reported by thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors in clinical practice of more than 137 specialties. RateRx represents the first comprehensive assessment of what experienced clinicians in each specialty actually use in the care of patients with specific conditions. Unlike other studies, which may report on the clinical effectiveness of treatments under controlled circumstances, RateRx calls on the deep, long-term, real-world experience of top doctors to reveal which treatments doctors have learned actually work with patients.

Doctors were asked to rate the clinical effectiveness of a drug for treating a condition on a scale of 1 to 5 stars. Contributing doctors gave ratings to medications for their use with specific indications based on their knowledge and were instructed to provide input based only on clinical experience using the drug for that indication. We summarized the combined ratings for each treatment into an aggregate rating reflecting doctors’ collective experiences. The profiles of all doctors who provided ratings are visible to users, who can review details of the doctors’ training and experiences, including their specialties and board certifications.

Participation in this study was open to all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing. All 66,000 doctors in HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network were encouraged to participate. In addition, HealthTap invited more than 500,000 U.S. licensed doctors in our extended network to participate. Doctors are able to enter effectiveness ratings for medications that treat any condition, and can enter and add ratings for any new medication treatments not already included.

RateRx results display each treatment for an indication in an ordered rank based on average ratings, from highest rated to lowest. When differences between the ratings of alternative treatments are deemed meaningful based on the amount of data presented.

To ensure unbiased doctor evaluations, doctors do not see their colleagues’ existing contributions until after they have entered their own rating. Recommendations cannot be changed once submitted, but after ratings are submitted, doctors can view the ratings of other doctors and comment on these. Both patients and doctors can learn from the RateRx ratings system. Patients benefit from the collective wisdom shared by these doctors, enabling them to see how different treatments for the same conditions are rated and reviewed. Doctors benefit from their colleagues’ ratings and comments, and are able to interpret them by referring to the contributing doctors’ practice profiles (which show their education and experience, their specialty training, years in practice, DocScore, and their “Known for” topics).

Comments, which are optional, are often used by doctors to qualify or explain ratings, or to share details of how medications are used for each indication. Comments are available to read and review, do not change the numeric value of the rating. Ratings are based on generic drug names, but brand names are presented to permit doctors to rate specific drugs. Brand names are shown for every generic medication name presented. This study does not differentiate ratings between different brand names for the same medication. The most common medication treatments for each condition are listed for ratings, but doctors are encouraged to add treatments for any indication, ensuring the inclusion of new or novel treatments for each condition. Doctors were instructed to add medications not previously on the list of standard treatment only if they had experience using the medication to treat the condition at issue and found these medication effective in the treatment of that condition.

Okay
trans-unit.source:
RateRx is a new, independent resource for doctors and patients alike, that presents ratings of medication effectiveness as reported by thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors in clinical practice of more than 137 specialties. RateRx represents the first comprehensive assessment of what experienced clinicians in each specialty actually use in the care of patients with specific conditions. Unlike other studies, which may report on the clinical effectiveness of treatments under controlled circumstances, RateRx calls on the deep, long-term, real-world experience of top doctors to reveal which treatments doctors have learned actually work with patients.

Doctors were asked to rate the clinical effectiveness of a drug for treating a condition on a scale of 1 to 5 stars. Contributing doctors gave ratings to medications for their use with specific indications based on their knowledge and were instructed to provide input based only on clinical experience using the drug for that indication. We summarized the combined ratings for each treatment into an aggregate rating reflecting doctors’ collective experiences. The profiles of all doctors who provided ratings are visible to users, who can review details of the doctors’ training and experiences, including their specialties and board certifications.

Participation in this study was open to all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing. All 66,000 doctors in HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network were encouraged to participate. In addition, HealthTap invited more than 500,000 U.S. licensed doctors in our extended network to participate. Doctors are able to enter effectiveness ratings for medications that treat any condition, and can enter and add ratings for any new medication treatments not already included.

RateRx results display each treatment for an indication in an ordered rank based on average ratings, from highest rated to lowest. When differences between the ratings of alternative treatments are deemed meaningful based on the amount of data presented.

To ensure unbiased doctor evaluations, doctors do not see their colleagues’ existing contributions until after they have entered their own rating. Recommendations cannot be changed once submitted, but after ratings are submitted, doctors can view the ratings of other doctors and comment on these. Both patients and doctors can learn from the RateRx ratings system. Patients benefit from the collective wisdom shared by these doctors, enabling them to see how different treatments for the same conditions are rated and reviewed. Doctors benefit from their colleagues’ ratings and comments, and are able to interpret them by referring to the contributing doctors’ practice profiles (which show their education and experience, their specialty training, years in practice, DocScore, and their “Known for” topics).

Comments, which are optional, are often used by doctors to qualify or explain ratings, or to share details of how medications are used for each indication. Comments are available to read and review, do not change the numeric value of the rating. Ratings are based on generic drug names, but brand names are presented to permit doctors to rate specific drugs. Brand names are shown for every generic medication name presented. This study does not differentiate ratings between different brand names for the same medication. The most common medication treatments for each condition are listed for ratings, but doctors are encouraged to add treatments for any indication, ensuring the inclusion of new or novel treatments for each condition. Doctors were instructed to add medications not previously on the list of standard treatment only if they had experience using the medication to treat the condition at issue and found these medication effective in the treatment of that condition.

Okay
trans-unit.target:
RateRx代表了第一个针对有经验的医生在他们各自的专业领域所使用的治疗特定情况病人的手段的全面性评估。与其他研究在特定的情况下评价治疗有效性不同的是，RateRx希望获得顶级医生深入而长期的实际经验来获取最佳治疗方法。推荐一旦被提交就无法更改，但是在提交打分之后，医生可以查看其它医生的评分并进行评论。患者可以从这种医生集体智慧中受益，让他们能够看到对相同症状的不同治疗方式是如何被评分与评价的。打分是基于药品的通用名称的，但是也会显示品牌名称，准许医生对特定的药品进行评分。该调查不会区分不同品牌的药物对同一种药物治疗方式的评分。

好

trans-unit.source: This email is already in use. Please {login_link_tag_start}log in{link_tag_end} or {forgotpw_link_tag_start}change password{link_tag_end}.
trans-unit.target: 此邮箱已使用。请{login_link_tag_start}登录{link_tag_end}或 {forgotpw_link_tag_start}修改密码{link_tag_end}.

trans-unit.resname: We are offering the patient the option to resume this consult by phone and we may be calling you from 650-620-7086 in the next 2 minutes
trans-unit.source: We are offering the patient the option to resume this consult by phone and we may be calling you from 650-620-7086 in the next 2 minutes
trans-unit.target: 我们为患者提供恢复此咨询的选项通过电话，我们可能会在接下来的2分钟使用650-620-7086呼叫您

trans-unit.resname: When you accept a consult, your patient will have the choice of interacting with you via video, voice, or text chat. It’s important to start each consult with a smile. Do whatever you can to make the patient feel comfortable. Practice now by typing a caring chat message below and pressing enter to send.
trans-unit.source: When you accept a consult, your patient will have the choice of interacting with you via video, voice, or text chat. It’s important to start each consult with a smile. Do whatever you can to make the patient feel comfortable. Practice now by typing a caring chat message below and pressing enter to send.
trans-unit.target: 当您接受咨询，您的患者将有机会选择通过视频，语音或文字聊天与您互动。用一个微笑开始每次咨询是非常重要的。做任何可以让患者感到舒适的事。现在实践在下面输入关心的聊天消息，然后按Enter键发送。

trans-unit.resname: All consults will start with a chat message from the patient explaining the reason for the consult.
trans-unit.source: All consults will start with a chat message from the patient explaining the reason for the consult.
trans-unit.target: 所有咨询将从患者的聊天消息开始解释咨询的原因。

trans-unit.resname: I have a skin rash and I’m concerned it might be from food allergies.
trans-unit.source: I have a skin rash and I’m concerned it might be from food allergies.
trans-unit.target: 我有皮疹，我担心它可能是因为食物过敏。

trans-unit.resname: One of the exciting things about virtual consults is that patients can share photos, test results, or other documents with you.
trans-unit.source: One of the exciting things about virtual consults is that patients can share photos, test results, or other documents with you.
trans-unit.target: 关于虚拟咨询的一个令人兴奋的事情是患者可以和你一起<b>共享照片，测试结果或其他文档</ b>。

trans-unit.resname: In addition to text consults, patients can choose to have video consults. Next we will check if your video is working correctly.
trans-unit.source: In addition to text consults, patients can choose to have video consults. Next we will check if your video is working correctly.
trans-unit.target: 除了文字咨询，病人可以选择视频咨询。接下来，我们将检查您的视频是否正常工作。

trans-unit.resname: Great! The Patient Chart will be very helpful to you, as you can see your patient’s medical history, read questions the patient has asked, and review consult notes from other HealthTap doctors.
trans-unit.source: Great! The Patient Chart will be very helpful to you, as you can see your patient’s medical history, read questions the patient has asked, and review consult notes from other HealthTap doctors.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了！<b>患者图表</ b>会对您非常有帮助，因为您可以看到您患者的病史，阅读患者（已询问）的问题并查看其他HealthTap医生的咨询笔记。

trans-unit.resname: Click on the different sections below to explore the patient chart. When ready, press the continue button.
trans-unit.source: Click on the different sections below to explore the patient chart. When ready, press the continue button.
trans-unit.target: 单击下面的不同部分以浏览患者图表。准备就绪后，按继续按钮。

trans-unit.resname: Tip: Always explain to the patient when you divert your eyes from the camera to read or type notes. Make them feel comfortable by explaining that this is normal and expected.
trans-unit.source: Tip: Always explain to the patient when you divert your eyes from the camera to read or type notes. Make them feel comfortable by explaining that this is normal and expected.
trans-unit.target: 小贴士：记得总是向患者解释，当您把眼睛从相机移开来读取或输入笔记。让他们感到舒适通过解释这是正常的和预期的。

trans-unit.resname: Intro consults are a first visit with a prospective patient who is not yet accepted into your practice. Even if you choose not to accept a patient into your practice, you can still offer advice and suggest appropriate follow-up care during the intro consult.
trans-unit.source: Intro consults are a first visit with a prospective patient who is not yet accepted into your practice. Even if you choose not to accept a patient into your practice, you can still offer advice and suggest appropriate follow-up care during the intro consult.
trans-unit.target: <b>咨询介绍</ b>是对未来患者的首次访问那些还没有被接受过您实践的人。即使您选择不接受患者进行您的实践，您仍然可以提供咨询并在介绍性咨询期间建议适当的后续护理。

trans-unit.resname: Enter Introductory Consult Notes for the patient. When done, press the continue button.
trans-unit.source: Enter Introductory Consult Notes for the patient. When done, press the continue button.
trans-unit.target: 为患者输入介绍性咨询注意事项。准备就绪后，按继续按钮。

trans-unit.resname: At any time during the intro consult, you may select the checkmark below the intro consult notes section to accept the patient into your virtual practice. This is a great way to extend your reach and grow your practice!
trans-unit.source: At any time during the intro consult, you may select the checkmark below the intro consult notes section to accept the patient into your virtual practice. This is a great way to extend your reach and grow your practice!
trans-unit.target: 在介绍咨询期间的任何时间，您可以选择复选标记以下介绍咨询注意事项部分<b>接受患者</ b> 进入您的虚拟实践。这是一个很好的方式来扩展您的范围和增长您的实践经验！

trans-unit.resname: When you accept a person as a patient, the full SOAP Note displays. To complete your consult, you'll need to complete and submit your summary or SOAP Note. To help you fully understand this form, let's take a tour through each of the sections.
trans-unit.source: When you accept a person as a patient, the full SOAP Note displays. To complete your consult, you'll need to complete and submit your summary or SOAP Note. To help you fully understand this form, let's take a tour through each of the sections.
trans-unit.target: 当您接受某人作为患者时，完整的<b> SOAP </ b>注意显示。要完成您的咨询，您需要完成并提交摘要或SOAP注释。为了帮助您完全理解这种形式，让我们观察每个部分和细节。

trans-unit.resname: When you accept a person as a patient, the full SOAP Note displays. To complete your consult and get paid for the visit, you'll need to complete and submit your summary or SOAP Note. To help you fully understand this form, let's take a tour through each of the sections.
trans-unit.source: When you accept a person as a patient, the full SOAP Note displays. To complete your consult and get paid for the visit, you'll need to complete and submit your summary or SOAP Note. To help you fully understand this form, let's take a tour through each of the sections.
trans-unit.target: 当您接受某人作为患者时，完整的<b> SOAP </ b>注意显示。要完成您的咨询，并得到访问的报酬，您需要完成并提交摘要或SOAP注释。为了帮助您完全理解这种形式，让我们观察每个部分和细节。

trans-unit.resname: Keep it up! You are more than half way done. Subjective, Objective, and Assessment sections are where you can enter text freely about the visit.
trans-unit.source: Keep it up! You are more than half way done. Subjective, Objective, and Assessment sections are where you can enter text freely about the visit.
trans-unit.target: 继续努力！您是一半以上了。<b>主观，客观， 和评估</ b>的部分，您可以在其中自由输入文字访问。

trans-unit.resname: The Plan section has several structured elements to help your patient follow through with your recommendations.
trans-unit.source: The Plan section has several structured elements to help your patient follow through with your recommendations.
trans-unit.target: <b>计划</ b>部分有几个结构化元素，可帮助您的患者遵循您的建议。

trans-unit.resname: This is where you can really help your patient! You’ll notice that you can add as many recommended actionable steps or follow-up care instructions. Make sure you have at least one. You can also turn any recommendation into a helpful regular reminder with just a few clicks.
trans-unit.source: This is where you can really help your patient! You’ll notice that you can add as many recommended actionable steps or follow-up care instructions. Make sure you have at least one. You can also turn any recommendation into a helpful regular reminder with just a few clicks.
trans-unit.target: 这是您真正可以帮助您的患者的地方！您会注意到您可以添加任意数量的<b>建议的可操作步骤</ b>或跟进的照顾说明。<b>请确保您至少有一个。</ b>您可以将任何建议变成有用的常规提醒那些提醒只需几次点击。

trans-unit.resname: Go ahead and give it a try. For example, recommend a 30-minute walk, once a day, for a month.
trans-unit.source: Go ahead and give it a try. For example, recommend a 30-minute walk, once a day, for a month.
trans-unit.target: 去吧，试试看。例如，建议步行30分钟，一个月中每天一次。

trans-unit.resname: One of the things patients really appreciate is that you can prescribe medications that are sent directly to a patient's indicated pharmacy. For patients located outside of the U.S, you can recommend medications.
trans-unit.source: One of the things patients really appreciate is that you can prescribe medications that are sent directly to a patient's indicated pharmacy. For patients located outside of the U.S, you can recommend medications.
trans-unit.target: 患者真正感谢的一个事情是，您可以开<b> 药方</ b>，并将其直接发送到患者指定的药房。对于位于美国以外的患者，您可以推荐药物。

trans-unit.resname: Another new functionality, that delights and saves patients time is the ability for you to order lab tests virtually. The lab order will be sent to the Quest Service Center the patient chooses. Once the patient has been tested you will be sent the results for review.
trans-unit.source: Another new functionality, that delights and saves patients time is the ability for you to order lab tests virtually. The lab order will be sent to the Quest Service Center the patient chooses. Once the patient has been tested you will be sent the results for review.
trans-unit.target: 另一个节省患者时间的新功能是您可以网上预定实验室检测。实验室订单将发送到患者选择的Quest服务中心。一旦患者已经测试，您将收到结果进行审查。

trans-unit.resname: Simply start typing to see the options of more than 2,000 lab tests you can order.
trans-unit.source: Simply start typing to see the options of more than 2,000 lab tests you can order.
trans-unit.target: 只需开始输入，便可查看超过2000个您可以预定的实验室检测。

trans-unit.resname: To suggest a follow-up appointment, include when the patient should schedule the appointment and, optionally, what the purpose of the follow-up is. The patient will receive a link to easily schedule the appointment.
trans-unit.source: To suggest a follow-up appointment, include when the patient should schedule the appointment and, optionally, what the purpose of the follow-up is. The patient will receive a link to easily schedule the appointment.
trans-unit.target: 建议后续预约，包括当患者何时应该安排预约，并且可选地规定后续活动的目的。患者将收到一个链接，以方便安排预约。

trans-unit.resname: You can refer your patients to any doctor within or outside the HealthTap network. Alternatively, refer a specialty and we’ll provide a list of specialists for your patient to choose from.
trans-unit.source: You can refer your patients to any doctor within or outside the HealthTap network. Alternatively, refer a specialty and we’ll provide a list of specialists for your patient to choose from.
trans-unit.target: 您可以<b>将您的患者</ b>转诊至任何医生不论他是否在HealthTap网络内。或者，参考专业，我们会提供您的患者可供选择的专家列表。

trans-unit.resname: Tip: We recommend you refer patients to doctors who participate in HealthTap Concierge so your patients can get immediate follow-up care. Concierge doctors will be indicated with a small green dot and labeled "Available for Virtual Consults".
trans-unit.source: Tip: We recommend you refer patients to doctors who participate in HealthTap Concierge so your patients can get immediate follow-up care. Concierge doctors will be indicated with a small green dot and labeled "Available for Virtual Consults".
trans-unit.target: 小贴士：我们建议您将患者转诊参加HealthTap Concierge，让您的患者可以立即接受后续护理。特邀医生将显示一个小绿点，表示为“可用于虚拟服务”。

trans-unit.resname: Checklists are recommended actions that help your patient achieve a health goal or feel better. Patients receive timely reminders for each to-do on the list. You can browse through a wealth of checklists that doctors on HealthTap have created by topic and choose the best one for your patient.
trans-unit.source: Checklists are recommended actions that help your patient achieve a health goal or feel better. Patients receive timely reminders for each to-do on the list. You can browse through a wealth of checklists that doctors on HealthTap have created by topic and choose the best one for your patient.
trans-unit.target: <b>检查清单</ b>是可帮助您的患者实现“ 健康目标或让患者感觉更好。患者接受及时的提醒，待办事项列表。您可以浏览大量HealthTap上的医生已经创建了主题的清单， 并选择一个对您的患者最好的方式。

trans-unit.resname: Patients see the SOAP notes you enter. If you wish to add notes only visible to doctors, please include them in the Additional Chart Notes section.
trans-unit.source: Patients see the SOAP notes you enter. If you wish to add notes only visible to doctors, please include them in the Additional Chart Notes section.
trans-unit.target: 请查看您输入的SOAP注释。如果您只想添加注释医生可见，请将其包括在<b>其他图表注释</ b>部分。

trans-unit.resname: In the unlikely event that the consult cannot be completed successfully or the patient behaves inappropriately, please flag the consult. This notifies us and ends the consult. Always inform your patient before you press the flag, as it will end the consult. Go ahead, try it now.
trans-unit.source: In the unlikely event that the consult cannot be completed successfully or the patient behaves inappropriately, please flag the consult. This notifies us and ends the consult. Always inform your patient before you press the flag, as it will end the consult. Go ahead, try it now.
trans-unit.target: 在不太可能的情况下，咨询不能成功完成或患者行为不当，请<b>标记咨询</ b>。这通知我们并结束咨询。始终通知您的患者，然后按<b>标志</ b>，因为它将结束咨询。去吧，现在尝试一下。

trans-unit.resname: When you click the 'Send & End Consult' button, the consult will end and your SOAP Note will be sent to the patient and become a part of their Patient's Chart. You can ask your patient to end the consult on their end so that you can take a few minutes to finish your SOAP Note. Then click this button when you are done.
trans-unit.source: When you click the 'Send & End Consult' button, the consult will end and your SOAP Note will be sent to the patient and become a part of their Patient's Chart. You can ask your patient to end the consult on their end so that you can take a few minutes to finish your SOAP Note. Then click this button when you are done.
trans-unit.target: 当您点击“发送和结束咨询”按钮时，<b>咨询将结束</ b> 并且您的SOAP注释将发送给患者，并成为其患者图表。您可以要求您的患者结束咨询以便您可以花几分钟时间完成SOAP 注释。然后点击这个按钮，当您完成后。

trans-unit.resname: Tip: Please remember to always start and finish every consult with a smile and warm greetings. When ending a consult, show patients that you care by asking if there's anything else you can do to help them.
trans-unit.source: Tip: Please remember to always start and finish every consult with a smile and warm greetings. When ending a consult, show patients that you care by asking if there's anything else you can do to help them.
trans-unit.target: 小贴士：请记住总是以微笑和温暖的问候来开始和完成每个咨询。结束咨询时，向患者显示出您确实在乎他们，通过询问是否有任何其他的您可以做的事情帮助他们。

trans-unit.resname: (Note: in an actual consult, this would trigger your earnings to go into your account, which gets disbursed monthly)
trans-unit.source: (Note: in an actual consult, this would trigger your earnings to go into your account, which gets disbursed monthly)
trans-unit.target: （注意：在实际咨询中，这将触发进入您的帐户的收入，其中获得支付是按月计算的）

trans-unit.resname: Once the consult has ended, you and the patient rate each other on a 5-star scale. At HealthTap, we strive for the highest standards, and the highest levels of customer satisfaction, so it’s important to maintain a high star ratings to retain your HealthTap Concierge license.
trans-unit.source: Once the consult has ended, you and the patient rate each other on a 5-star scale. At HealthTap, we strive for the highest standards, and the highest levels of customer satisfaction, so it’s important to maintain a high star ratings to retain your HealthTap Concierge license.
trans-unit.target: 一旦咨询结束，您和患者<b>相互评价</ b>在5星级内。在HealthTap，我们努力达到最高标准， 和最高水平的客户满意度，所以重要的是维持高的星级评分，以保留您的HealthTap Concierge许可证。

trans-unit.resname: It seems our plugin does not have permission to load in your browser. {link_tag_start}Click here{link_tag_end} to learn how to enable this.
trans-unit.source: It seems our plugin does not have permission to load in your browser. {link_tag_start}Click here{link_tag_end} to learn how to enable this.
trans-unit.target: 似乎我们的插件没有权限加载到您的浏览器。{link_tag_start}点击这里{link_tag_end}以了解如何启用这个。

trans-unit.resname: Do you see yourself? If not, click the white gear icon on the bottom left to check your camera settings.
trans-unit.source: Do you see yourself? If not, click the white gear icon on the bottom left to check your camera settings.
trans-unit.target: 您可以看到自己吗？如果没有，请单击左下角以检查相机设置。

trans-unit.resname: Do you see yourself? If not, click the white gear icon on the top left to check your camera settings.
trans-unit.source: Do you see yourself? If not, click the white gear icon on the top left to check your camera settings.
trans-unit.target: 您可以看到自己吗？如果没有，请单击左下角以检查相机设置。

trans-unit.resname: If you need additional support, please contact your IT department.
trans-unit.source: If you need additional support, please contact your IT department.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要额外的帮助，请联系您的信息技术部门。

trans-unit.resname: If you need additional support, please email {email_link_tag_start}{email}{link_tag_end} or call us at {phone}.
trans-unit.source: If you need additional support, please email {email_link_tag_start}{email}{link_tag_end} or call us at {phone}.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要其他支持，请发邮件到{email_link_tag_start}{email}{link_tag_end} 或致电{phone}.

trans-unit.resname: It seems like you are still having issues granting permission to the plug-in. Don't worry, continue now and someone from our team will call you later to help you set up your plug-in.
trans-unit.source: It seems like you are still having issues granting permission to the plug-in. Don't worry, continue now and someone from our team will call you later to help you set up your plug-in.
trans-unit.target: 您似乎仍然有问题关于授予的权限的插入。 别担心，现在继续，我们团队的人会稍后再致电给您，帮助您设置插件。

trans-unit.resname: Here are a few additional facts you should know: • Patients schedule appointments during your virtual office hours • Your next day’s schedule is sent by email at 9pm{appointments}
trans-unit.source: Here are a few additional facts you should know: • Patients schedule appointments during your virtual office hours • Your next day’s schedule is sent by email at 9pm{appointments}
trans-unit.target: 以下是您应该了解的一些其他事实：•患者计划您的虚拟办公时间内的约会•您的第二天的日程安排在下午9点通过电子邮件发送{appointments}

trans-unit.resname: Just like you're available when your real {clinic_slash}office is open, it's important that you're online and available during your designated Virtual Office Hours. Patients may be looking for you at these times. You do not have to be at your desk, simply sign in and set yourself as “available” on the HealthTap for Doctors mobile app. The app will ring when your patient calls.
trans-unit.source: Just like you're available when your real {clinic_slash}office is open, it's important that you're online and available during your designated Virtual Office Hours. Patients may be looking for you at these times. You do not have to be at your desk, simply sign in and set yourself as “available” on the HealthTap for Doctors mobile app. The app will ring when your patient calls.
trans-unit.target: 就像您在真正的{ clinic_slash }办公室开放时可用，重要的是，您在指定的虚拟期间在线可用办公时间。患者可能会在这些时间寻找您。您不一定要在您的办公桌，只需在HealthTap为医生设计的移动应用程序登录并将自己的状态设置为“可用”。应用程序会发出铃声当您的患者呼叫。

trans-unit.resname: Tip: The HealthTap for Doctors app is available to download for free on any mobile device or tablet for iOS and Android. You can start consults on your mobile device. At any time, you can continue the consult on your computer by going to your logged in homepage.
trans-unit.source: Tip: The HealthTap for Doctors app is available to download for free on any mobile device or tablet for iOS and Android. You can start consults on your mobile device. At any time, you can continue the consult on your computer by going to your logged in homepage.
trans-unit.target: 小贴士：HealthTap为医生设计的移动应用程序可供下载在iOS和Android的任何移动设备或平板电脑上均可免费下载。您可以在您的移动设备上开始咨询。在任何时候，您均可以继续您的计算机上的咨询，转到您登录的主页。

trans-unit.resname: You can set your shifts at your convenience, and you can change them at any time by clicking "Shift Schedule."
trans-unit.source: You can set your shifts at your convenience, and you can change them at any time by clicking "Shift Schedule."
trans-unit.target: 您可以选择在您最方便的时候设置班次，您可以随时通过点击“排班表”更改它们。

trans-unit.resname: You can set your virtual office hours at your convenience, and you can change them at any time. You can update your virtual office hours, set vacation days, and choose "unavailable" times by clicking "Practice Hours."
trans-unit.source: You can set your virtual office hours at your convenience, and you can change them at any time. You can update your virtual office hours, set vacation days, and choose "unavailable" times by clicking "Practice Hours."
trans-unit.target: 您可以在方便时设置<b>虚拟办公时间</ b>，并且您可以随时更改它们。通过单击“实践时间”，您可以更新您的虚拟办公室小时，设置假期日期。

trans-unit.resname: In addition to live virtual consults, you will also receive Inbox Consults. These are paid, detailed messages from your patients that appear at the top of your homepage feed and must be answered within 24 hours. You will earn $30 when you complete patient consults and submit your SOAP Note.
trans-unit.source: In addition to live virtual consults, you will also receive Inbox Consults. These are paid, detailed messages from your patients that appear at the top of your homepage feed and must be answered within 24 hours. You will earn $30 when you complete patient consults and submit your SOAP Note.
trans-unit.target: 除了实时虚拟咨询，您还将收到<b> 收件箱咨询 </ b>。这些是您患者付费的详细的消息， 显示在您的首页的顶部，必须在24小时答复。当您完成患者咨询并提交您的SOAP注释，您将赚到30美金。

trans-unit.resname: Inbox Consults are detailed questions from your patients that appear at the top of your homepage feed and must be answered within 24 hours. You can send clarification questions and have a conversation with the patients. To end the consult, simply submit the SOAP note.
trans-unit.source: Inbox Consults are detailed questions from your patients that appear at the top of your homepage feed and must be answered within 24 hours. You can send clarification questions and have a conversation with the patients. To end the consult, simply submit the SOAP note.
trans-unit.target: <b>收件箱咨询</ b>是关于您患者的详细问题， 他们将显示在您的首页的顶部，您必须在24小时答复。您可以发送解释性问题和和患者开启谈话。\要结束咨询，只需提交SOAP注释。

trans-unit.resname: Tip: Please respond to any Inbox Consults within 24 hours. Submit your answer as a SOAP consult note, or ask your patient follow-up questions by entering your question and clicking the “Wait for response” button.
trans-unit.source: Tip: Please respond to any Inbox Consults within 24 hours. Submit your answer as a SOAP consult note, or ask your patient follow-up questions by entering your question and clicking the “Wait for response” button.
trans-unit.target: 小贴士：请在24小时内回复所有收件箱咨询。提交您的答案作为SOAP咨询笔记，或问您的患者后续问题，通过输入您的问题和单击“等待响应”按钮。
